reviews.sentence: 10 wonderful days. The room was comfortable we had two beds one for us and one for our 11 year old daughter. The room was always clean. We had a beautiful view of the McDonel ranges which changed colour throughout the day. We did not eat at the restaurant we could not afford to but we were there to visit our nephew and his wife so we ate lunch and dinner out most days. I have a movement disability and the shower was in the bath. I had let the hotel know that Iwould like a toilet raiser if possible and a shower chair but theoy did not seem to have read the comments and even looking at me in the foyer booked me into a room with the shower over the bath with no comment to say they could not provide me with a room that was disability friendly.

Comfortable. The foyer is what an Alice classy foyer should be all Chandelier and tiled floors. Check in was easy my room was clean comfortable and lived up to my expectations with slippers comfy lounge chair and reasonable amount of space. Shower and amenities were great and the garden views were private. Room service was quick as a flick and staff friendly. I will be a return guest and definitely signing up for Honors.

Okay stay. Stayed 4 nights for work purposes. Hotel looks dated but staff at reception was efficient Room smelled a bit funny but spacious and clean with a comfortable bed and well stocked bathroom. Breakfast was fine but not much variety. I ordered room service and food arrived quickly. Gym was well equipped and pool was nice especially during the hot afternoons. There s also a slightly aggressive peacock roaming around the hotel. Tried calling the Careline service for some help and never had anyone picked up the phone. Spoke to my colleagues and they said the same thing as well. I then tried calling reception after no one answered on the Careline number and again no one answered the phone. And I tried doing this everyday during my stay and never had anyone picked up the phone. I know the phone is working because when I called room service it was answered almost instantly. I walked to reception a couple of times after this and always found reception empty. I waited for about 5 10 minutes before anyone came out to talk to me. Maybe they need a bell on the desk or more staff to answer the phone calls. Check out went smoothly as well. Plus points for having Hanuman restaurant in the foyer great food. Otherwise not a bad stay would have been better if staff were more attentive to guests.

Quiet and pleasing. An enjoyable hotel with great food options located in the lobby. The mountain views were astonishing upon arrival and throughout our stay a must if you stay. Room service was very efficient and staff were attentive in all of our needs. Spaciousness views and friendly staff as well as the beautiful Peacock roaming around the pool every day. The hotel as a whole feels very run down. Needs a fresh coat of paint feels very 1980s. Otherwise no other complaints.

Lovely place to stay. This is really lovely. Room is great and extremely comfortable. Room overlooking pool. Was some mix up when we arrived and room was not ready and kept us waiting an extra hour. Otherwise was quite good.
Comfortable and quiet. We enjoyed our stay and found the room very comfortable and quiet. Would stay again. Thank you.

Nice and clean hotel in great surrounds. Really enjoyed our stay at the Doubletree. The hotel is clean and well kept. Staff are friendly and accommodating nothing was too much hassle during our stay. The building looks older and there are not any refurbished rooms as such but it is tidy and includes all the modern amenities. The pool area was lovely and central to the rooms grounds were pretty and the view was amazing. The location of the hotel is close to the main town but also next door to Laseters Casino and various restaurants in that complex. Join the Hilton Honours club free to book a room on the third floor. The view to the MacDonel Ranges is awesome and also looks over the golf course. Really pretty. I would certainly recommend staying there.
A great break from a long drive and would stay there again. The room was very comfortable and the Indian restaurant was excellent.

Good base for exploring Alice and surrounds. Room was on the south side so with lovely views of the ranges. No major problems with our stay and the room was spacious. We stayed six nights and was a really good base to explore the area. Only down side would be the room and bathroom fittings are getting a little tired but overall recommended and good value. Staff were very helpful and room cleaning good.
Great location beautiful pool nice mountain view and a small business center made our stay enjoyable and memorable. Also easy aces to all major roads.
Pleasant. The rooms were dated in need of a refresh renovation. The in room lighting was terrible. There was no one to assist with getting luggage to from the rooms. There was no in room free wi fi.

Nice but not fancy. This hotel used to be a Sheraton 30 years ago when we lived here. As others have said the bathrooms could use remodeling. We were on the Hilton Honors floor so I ca n’t say if our bathroom was typical of the whole place. The room was average nothing special but it did have a fridge and balcony overlooking the golf course. I ’d say that ’s a better view than the pool. Pool area and resident peacock were nice but the cafe bar did n’t appear to be open. Guest laundry was handy and they sold detergent at the front desk. Location is convenient to the casino on one side and Olive Pink Preserve good breakfast on the other and you probably could walk downtown during the day if it ’s not too hot. We ate at Saltbush one night nothing special. Hanuman was packed. Gift shop had some cute stuff.

Miscomunication. When we checked in I provided the staff with our Hilton Honors Card and asked if they could get us into our room early as we had arrived early. Staff said that the room was not available but they could give us an upgrade and we could soon be in a room. Upgrade included a view and breakfast. View was n’t important as we had a 19 hr tour the next day but breakfast sounded good. When we checked out there was a charge for the view and breakfast. We talked with the manager and he said they never “ give ” breakfast. Unfortunately for us Americans give means free. Apparently give to the Hilton meant it could be provided at a cost. I thought our Hilton Honors gave us the perk. Silly me.

Good. The staff were very friendly and the buffet breakfast was excellent. I had to wait until 5 pm for my room to be ready. The check in staff were very apologetic and provided me with drink vouchers and breakfast as compensation which was nice. There was no room service menu or bottle opener in my room.
Clean Tidy. Clean and tidy with friendly staff. Stains on the carpet in our room.

Work trip. Stayed for a couple of nights with work. Check in was easy and fast. The public areas are nice. The food at Hanuman is excellent. Breakfast was good too. The room I had was second floor overlooking the pool. It was fine but a bit tired particularly the bathroom. On my way to a meeting I used the lift to get from level 2 to 1 in my accommodation block and the lift got stuck with just me in it on level 2. A maintenance guy reset it after I called reception. I was probably stuck for only 5 10 minutes but it felt like an eternity. There was no acknowledgement from hotel management nor apology which surprised me. Checkout took way too long despite chargeback. Overall ok but not brilliant for the price.
Could stand a few improvements. Charging for smartphones tablets there will be one point to bring it up today. Cups or glasses in the bathroom.

Best place to stay in Alice. My family and I stay here every year for the Finke Desert Race and it is always a great place to stay. There are great views on either sides of the hotel whether it be the beautiful ranges surrounding Alice Springs or the swimming pool area. The buffet breakfast is always fantastic. For those staying for the Finke Desert Race it is walking distance from the presentation night location and 5 10 minutes drive to the start finish line so the location is perfect.
Staff were friendly and helpful rooms were nice and the restaurant meal we had was very good. Prices for the meals were a little expensive and the taps in the bathroom leaked when used.

Rubbish View. To clarify the overall rating as Good what the flight centre did not say was the hotel was having a Renovation in progress having been shown our room we looked out on what we expected panoramic vista view looked out on to a Dumpster pile of rubbish old mattress having complained we were moved we were also told 1015min walk to CBD what they did not say was you would be accompanied by a 10 flys in 40 heat a Taxi was 12 No shuttle bus. this is far from our expectations have to say of a Hilton Hotel unfortunately doubtful we will be going back to Alice anytime soon so a revisit is not going to happen yes the staff. the service was not top notch as choice given was good but room for improvement.
